response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item is worth $12,000 to us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. To ensure that we both benefit from this transaction, I am proposing to sell it to you for $10,800. This represents an outstanding value, considering the product's true worth and the benefits it will bring to you. I look forward to hearing your response. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 10800}
